name: Space Hunt (itch) (Eysp)
description:
Oh no, you've just realized you're out of space milk. 

The space store closes in 10 space minutes, and the space parking lot is already clear full of space cars!

There's got to be one space parking space free somewhere in this space parking lot, drive your space car with the space arrow keys to find it... but don't hit the other space cars!

Created in three space days for Untitled Game Jam #43. (Theme: Space)

Note: There's a weird space bug where sometimes space cars will fly off randomly at the start of the space round. It shouldn't affect your space score, but it may leave extra space parking spaces. The space parking space you must park your space car in is always marked with a nice green space glow.

Spaaaaaace
